title: 3 Choume no Tama: Uchi no Tama Shirimasenka?
title_japanese: 3丁目のタマ うちのタマ知りませんか?
title_synonyms: San Choume no Tama Uchi no Tama Shirimasenka?
Sanchome no Tama: Uchi no Tama Shirimasenka?
synopsis: The characters are Tama, Momo, Wocket, Tiggle, Rockney, Pimmy, Bupkus, Bengpu, and Chopin. There is no consistent plot. Tama and his friends just have little, family friendly, adventures every episode. The only consistency is when a new friend is made one episode and flash backs. (Source: ANN)

Other.name: 3 Choume no Tama: Onegai! Momo-chan wo Sagashite!!
Tama & Friends: Uchi no Tama Shirimasenka?

opening_themes: "Ai wa Genki-desu. (愛は元気です。)" by Yumi Tanimura (eps 1-9)
"Genki da Shite yo (元気だしてよ)" by Yumi Tanimura (eps 10-35)
ending_themes: "Bokura wa Nakama da Tama Ondo (ボクらは仲間だタマ音頭)" by Hiroko Kasahara (eps 1-9)
"Mitsu Ami Hippatte (みつあみ引っ張って)" by Yuuko Kumai (eps 10-35)
